mapper.select: select * from science_situation l, (select min(displacement) min, max(displacement) max from science_grade where displacement >= (select max(displacement) from science_grade where displacement <= #{minRank}) and displacement <= (select min(displacement) from science_grade where displacement >= #{maxRank})) g where l.displacement <= g.max and l.displacement >= g.min and province = #{location} order by displacement desc
